attributes.action: listen to the real scientific evidence that CO2 does not drive global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All scientific evidence shows that the natural levels of Global temperture changes are directly caused by the rate of solar activity, and the levels of CO2 in the environment have NO impact on global temperature levels. Increased Solar activity as seen in the past 30 years is causing the temperature rise. In addition humans CO2 production accounts for less than 2% of total atmospheric CO2 levels, decaying leaves produces 100 times more CO2 each year! In fact volcano's produce more CO2 than humans!STOP the CO2 nonsence now, its damaging both the UK and 3rd world economies!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
